titleStmt.title: The natures, uses, & doses of several approved and experienced medicines, faithfully prepared by John Spire, junr. medicinæ professor. To which is added, a catalogue of various chymical preparations, by him always ready prepared
titleStmt.author: Spire, John, apothecary.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Benja. Harris, senr. in Great East-cheap, for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
